item.title: Deal is done to keep TikTok in the US, says Trump
item.description: The social media platform had faced a ban in the US over national security concerns.

item.title: Trump says he will sue New York Times for $15bn
item.description: He has accused the paper of defamation and libel, saying it served as a "mouthpiece" for Democrats.

item.title: Kirk shooting suspect appeared to confess on Discord
item.description: Tyler Robinson is thought to have discussed the killing on the online platform before his arrest.

item.title: Acting legend Robert Redford dies aged 89
item.description: The acting star was famous for roles in The Sting and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

item.title: Coup plot charges for former Romanian presidential candidate
item.description: Prosecutors say the right-wing former presidential candidate conspired to overthrow constitutional order in the country.
